title: Cezar Augusto
bottomHeadline: Hi, I'm Cezar Augusto. I write this blog.
keywords: developer, engineer, builder, front-end, web, software, performance, standards, tooling, browser
intro: I work at [Brave](https://brave.com), hacking on the client-side. I like talking about tooling, performance, and JavaScript.
social: You can follow me on [GitHub](https://github.com/cezaraugusto) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cezaraugusto).
bio: Cezar Augusto is a software engineer at Brave Software working on desktop browser.
